vclaim: Before U.S. President-elect Joe Biden’s Jan. 20, 2021, inauguration, the Army band practiced “Hit the Road Jack” outside of the White House, where then-President Donald Trump was still in residence.
title: Did Military Band Play ‘Hit the Road Jack’ Outside the White House?
subtitle: Many on social media cheered what appeared to be an epic troll of then-U.S. President Donald Trump.
author: Madison Dapcevich
